description: Shinomiya Kyouya is forced to become a new member of the GJ, an unidentified club that dwells in a room of the former building of a certain school. Here he meets the club leader, Mao, a short girl with a big attitude; Mao's younger sister, Megumi, who has the heart of a bipolar angel; the recognized genius with a lack of common sense, Shion; and the always-hungry and mysterious Kirara. Time flies with these unique girls around.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

node.description:
Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.

__Agency:__ Hibiki

[Website](http://mimorin.com/) | [Profile (Hibiki Cast)](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/mimori_suzuko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mimori_suzuko)  | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mimorin.official/) | [LINE Blog](https://lineblog.me/mimori_suzuko/)

**Non anime roles:**
- Sangonomiya Kokomi - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Match - Kirara Fantasia (VG)
- Pinkie Pie - My Little Pony Friendship is Magic (Japanese dub)
- Rapunzel - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Website](http://uchidamaaya.jp/) | [Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=26) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/maaya_taso) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/uchidamaayataso/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJFEXIRB6DP_2FQJzv7pbXg)

Maaya Uchida is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer who works for I'm Enterprise. She is [Yuuma Uchida](https://anilist.co/staff/119617/)'s older sister.

**Awards:**
- She won the Best New Actress Award at the 8th Seiyuu Awards, for her role as [Hajime Ichinose](https://anilist.co/character/85153/).

**Non anime roles:**
- [Fischl](https://anilist.co/character/209685/Fischl) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Ichihime](https://anilist.co/character/200348/Ichihime) - Mahjong Soul (VG)

Otome Shinto is a female idol group formed December 6, 2012. Its first single "Mousou★Koukan Nikki (もうそう★こうかんにっき)" was used for the opening theme song of the TV anime GJ-bu and was released on February 20, 2013. 

__Members:__ -Aoi Wakana (葵 わかな), blue - Chika Arakawa (荒川 ちか), red - Yurika Takahashi (高橋 優里花), pink - Ayame Tajiri (田尻 あやめ), yellow
In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.
